channel.title: three.js on David Peicho's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in three.js on David Peicho's Blog

item.title: ArtFlow
item.description: WebVR experience in which users can draw and build a world in the same way they would do it in Tilt Brush or Quill. ArtFlow was made to finalize my Master’s Degree at EPITA.

item.title: (2/2) Behind The Scene: Cloud Raymarching Demo
item.description: Second part of Behind The Scene: Cloud Raymarching Demo, in which we will go through how to improve the lighting and how to create the burning effect.

item.title: (1/2) Behind The Scene: Cloud Raymarching Demo
item.description: This blog post will walk you through how I created the volume rendering visualization available on the Home page.
